desc: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

name: nevermore_shadowraze1

desc: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. If the killed unit is a hero, he gains 12 souls.  On death, he releases half of them from bondage.
notes: Denies, neutral creeps, and buildings also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.
attrib:
DAMAGE PER SOUL: 2
MAX SOULS: 15/22/29/36
lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
name: nevermore_necromastery

affects:
ABILITY: Passive, Aura
AFFECTS: Enemies
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
notes: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.
lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
name: nevermore_dark_lord

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will have its movement speed and attack damage reduced. Lines of energy are created for every 2 souls captured through Necromastery. Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
notes:
One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every 2 souls in his possession, for a maximum of 18 lines.
The movement and attack damage reductions from Requiem of Souls go through spell immunity.
attrib:
CAST DELAY: 1.67
MOVEMENT REDUCTION: 25%
DAMAGE REDUCTION: 50%
REDUCTION DURATION: 5.000000
cmb:
150/175/200
120/110/100
lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
name: nevermore_requiem
